name: Circa Micro
tag_list: electronic-components, atmel, xilinx, cypress, obsolete-parts, military-parts, eol-parts, hard-to-find-parts
overview:
Circa Micro is a leading supplier of aftermarket electronic components. Located in the United States and Europe Circa Micro has far reaching sourcing capabilities. Circa Micro stocks over 1.2 million line items in its Florida facility and has over 1.3 billion part numbers available. With customers ranging from the United States government to individual use Circa Micro caters to all consumer needs.
Circa Micro stocks parts from major manufacturers such as Atmel, Cypress, Xilinx, IDT, Microsemi, STMicro, AMD, Intel, TE Connectivity and much more. With part numbers going obsolete everyday customer can rely on Circa Micro to help keep their production lines moving.
